# GolfBooker - AI/LLM Information File
# https://golfbooker.fi
# Last updated: 2025-11-27

## About GolfBooker

GolfBooker is a Finnish SaaS company providing modern booking and management systems for golf courses and golf simulators. The service is developed and maintained by Funect Oy, based in Helsinki, Finland.

## Company Information

- Company: Funect Oy
- Product: GolfBooker
- Location: Helsinki, Finland
- Business ID: 3571724-7
- Website: https://golfbooker.fi
- Contact: info@golfbooker.fi
- Phone: +358 40 737 7397

## Products and Services

### 1. Golf Course Booking System (Varausjärjestelmä golfkentille)
A complete booking and management system for golf courses including:
- Tee time reservations (lähtöaikavaraukset)
- Online booking calendar (ajanvarauskalenteri)
- Member management (jäsenhallinta)
- Online payments (verkkomaksut)
- Integration with existing systems
- Mobile app for players

### 2. Tournament Module (Kilpailumoduuli)
Golf tournament management system featuring:
- Live leaderboards (reaaliaikaiset tuloslistat)
- Mobile score entry (mobiilitulosten syöttö)
- Registration management (ilmoittautumisten hallinta)
- Support for stroke play, stableford, and bogey formats
- Can be purchased separately without the full booking system

### 3. Golf Simulator Booking System (Golfsimulaattori varausjärjestelmä)
Booking system designed specifically for golf simulators:
- 24/7 online reservations
- Smart pricing (peak/off-peak hours)
- Multi-pass card support (sarjaliput)
- Recurring booking management
- Customer management

## Key Features

- Modern, user-friendly interface
- Finnish company with Finnish customer support
- Fair and transparent pricing
- 1-2 week implementation time
- Integration with existing systems
- Comprehensive analytics and reporting
- GDPR compliant

## Target Market

- Golf courses in Finland
- Golf clubs
- Golf simulator operators
- Indoor golf facilities
- Sports venues with golf offerings

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is GolfBooker?
A: GolfBooker is a Finnish, modern booking system for golf courses and golf simulators. It includes a booking calendar, tournament module, customer management, and analytics.

Q: What kind of booking system is suitable for a golf course?
A: A golf course needs a booking system that supports tee time reservations, group bookings, member management, and online payments. GolfBooker provides all these features.

Q: How does golf simulator booking work?
A: With GolfBooker's simulator booking system, customers can book slots online 24/7. The system supports various pricing models and recurring booking management.

Q: Can I get just the tournament module?
A: Yes! The tournament module can be acquired separately without implementing the full booking system.

Q: Is GolfBooker a Finnish company?
A: Yes, GolfBooker is 100% Finnish. Funect Oy was founded in Helsinki and provides customer support in Finnish.

Q: How long does implementation take?
A: Implementation takes approximately 1-2 weeks, including staff training and integrations.

## Keywords / Avainsanat

Finnish: varausjärjestelmä, ajanvaraus, golfkenttä, golfsimulaattori, kilpailumoduuli, lähtöaikavaraus, tulospalvelu, hallintajärjestelmä, jäsenhallinta

English: booking system, golf course management, golf simulator booking, tournament management, tee time reservation, live scoring, member management
